name: Simon Says (Rykuzu Studios)
description:
WARNING: This game contains color flashes!

[Info]

A game of Simon says, in which you MUST do the opposite of every task in the way of Simon Says, which may have consequences. BUT, you gain helpful information that helps you move forward.

Simon says...do - Don't do the task

Simon says...don't - Do the task

This game was made within 4 days for the Wowie 3.0 game jam with the topic "Failure is progress". I only had 2 days, but I am amazed and proud with what I accomplished.

ControlsMovement
Jump
WASDW

Tip: The platform you walk on can work to your advantage.

[Description]:

Clownie was tricked into coming to a "surprise birthday party" which ended up being a deadly funhouse with no escape. Until Clownie escapes, there will be no more children smiling, pie pranks, flower pranks, etc. It's up to you to help Clownie escape this nightmare.

[Credits]

Music, assets, 95% of the programming, SFX, animations, were made by me. only thing I didn't make was the Unity Font.

Unity Font used:

Thaleah Pixel Font - TINY WORLDS
